name: In Boxes (Working Title)
description:
A short game for #ResistJam 2017 about "not racism," as in, discrimination based on factors that are invisible, like religion. The inspirations were the novel 1984 by George Orwell and the latest travel bans in the US.

I have plans to release several colorblind-friendly versions in the near future. If you have any suggestions for the game, please feel free to comment below.

Made in Unity 5.5, after I relearned the new scripting stuff.
